pullrequest.title: add bvh animation support for skeleton

content.raw:
@{557058:10b01d41-a2e9-4a41-a907-e6e2f03b6cd5} , I addressed your comments on this PR: https://bitbucket.org/mingfeisun/ign-common/pull-requests/2/

Unfortunately, Bitbucket doesn't let me open a PR directly to this repo because it's the fork of a fork. But if you approve those changes, I can push them directly here. Or we can wait for @{557058:ad32c2b0-bebb-403e-b385-c3c1f7aa1d09} to wake up :sweat_smile:
content.html:
